mapper.select: SELECT s.id AS s_id, s.date AS s_date, s.start_time AS s_start_time, s.place_id AS s_place_id, s.content AS s.content, s.place_url AS s.placeUrl, s.idx AS s.idx, p.id AS p_id, p.start_day AS p_start_day, p.end_day AS p_end_day, p.name AS p_name, p.location AS p_location FROM schedules s JOIN planners p ON s.planner_id = p.id WHERE s.id = #{s.id}

SELECT s.id AS s_id, s.date AS s_date, s.start_time AS s_start_time, s.place_id AS s_place_id, s.content AS s_content, s.place_url AS s_place_url, p.id AS p_id, p.start_day AS p_start_day, p.end_day AS p_end_day, p.name AS p_name, p.location AS p_location FROM schedules s JOIN planners p ON s.planner_id = p.id WHERE s.planner_id = #{plannerId} ORDER BY s.date, s.start_time

update.foreach: UPDATE schedules SET date = #{schedule.date}, start_time = #{schedule.startTime}, place_id = #{schedule.placeId}, place_url = #{schedule.placeUrl}, content = #{schedule.content}, idx = #{schedule.idx} WHERE id = #{schedule.id} AND planner_id = #{schedule.plannerId}
